name: ELEX Product Feed for WooCommerce
author: ELEXtensions

sections.description:
With ELEX Product Feed for WooCommerce plugin, you can easily list your WooCommerce products as ads on Facebook and Instagram. This plugin also enables you to automatically sync simple WooCommerce products with Facebook catalogs.

Features

  • Supports WooCommerce Simple Products
  • Display your Products on Facebook Marketplace & Instagram Shopping
  • Generate Unlimited Feeds and Schedule the Execution
  • Intuitive Dashboard to Manage Multiple Feeds
  • Supports Multiple Countries and File Formats
  • Configure to Refresh the Feed Automatically
  • Automatically Sync Simple WooCommerce Products with Facebook Catalog
  • Choose a Language for Product Categories
  • Map your Product Categories with Google Product Categories
  • Map your Product Attributes Efficiently
  • Map Custom Attributes Seamlessly
  • Exclude Products from Feed Generation
  • Feed Performance Report
  • Filter Products Based on Vendors, Stock, and Sold Quantities
  • Generate Feeds for Featured Products

Premium version Features

For complete list of latest features and details, please visit ELEX WooCommerce Catalog Feed for Facebook & Instagram premium version product page.

  • Supports WooCommerce Variable Products.
  • Support Multiple Languages for Google Product Categories.
  • Timely compatibility updates and bug fixes.
  • Premium Support!

Premium Version walkthrough Video

Documentation

Visit the Product Documentation for ELEX WooCommerce Google Shopping (Google Product Feed).

About Facebook Shopping | Facebook Product Feed | Instagram Product Feed

Facebook Marketplace is a potential platform for merchants to sell their products where customers are already searching for those products! Over 1 billion users in the world and 1 in 3 people in the US choose this convenient Marketplace to find the right products they are looking for based on their location, the category, and the price of products. Well, as a shop owner, this is the right place to list your products!

Hence, listing on the Facebook Marketplace will be an additional push for your brand and products, so that they easily reach customers who search for them. With this, you will be connecting the right customers rather than randomly listing products in front of any Facebook user.

About ELEXtensions

We are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores.

Tutorial / Manual
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it! you can now configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
1.What if I face issues with the plugin? Do you provide support for free products?
If you are facing any issues, please create a topic at plugin support section on wordpress org. Our team will respond back soon.
sections.changelog:
3.1.2

  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.6
  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 9.1

3.1.1

  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.5
  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 8.9

3.1.0

  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.4.3
  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 8.6
  • Made compatible with HPOS

3.0.2

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 8.0
  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.3
  • Made compatible with php 8.2

3.0.1

  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 7.8

3.0.0

  • UX Improvement
  • Create feeds for checkout on Facebook (Only for the US)
  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.2
  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 7.6

2.0.1

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 7.2
  • Tested with WordPress 6.1

2.0.0

  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.0
  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 6.8
  • Made compatible with WPML
  • An option to connect to the Commerce Manager to Sync the Simple products to Facebook & Instagram under the Settings tab

1.0.2

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 6.5

1.0.1

  • Tested with WooCommerce 6.4
  • Tested with WordPress 5.9

1.0.0

  • Initial Push
